body:
There are countless threads on people telling the server to downgrade.
There are hundreds of threads on people telling the staff to consider their opinions (Which you do).
There are countless threads on people asking for better staff, or staff members that actually care about the server.

Similarly, 

There are 12 months in a year.
There exactly 52.1429 weeks in a year.
There are 365 days in a year
There are 8760 hours in a year 
There are 525600 minutes in a year
There are 31,540,000 seconds in a year

Some of our staff members here at Avicus, have spent double the amount of time listed above, onto improving the server for your good. 
So why don't we pay them back for what they've helped us achieve, rather than asking them to constantly improve their ways?
Why don't we show them that all their help is actually worth it?

-Zal

title: Please

replies.body:
Interesting facts I stumbled upon.

The seniors have spent roughly 271 days on the server (without considering alts and the time between *about a month*)

All the staff have spent 1224 days on the server in total. (This is excluding refs and officials and alts.)

replies.body:
It's my opinion on your correction of his statistics. It's hardly the attitude of the moderators. Everyone is entitled to their opinion, be they staff member or player. 

If what I said offended you, I apologise. =)
